original_text: For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock.
korean_text: 여호와께서 환난 날에 나를 그의 초막 속에 비밀히 지키시고 그의 장막 은밀한 곳에 나를 숨기시며 높은 바위 위에 두시리로다

sentences.original_text: For in the time of trouble
he shall hide me in his pavilion
in the secret of his tabernacle
he shall set me up upon a rock
